nodes.bodyText: Make sure to also add these to SpliceSparkKryoRegistrator.java.
I did not create this file :-)
Please consider writing a class version number (e.g. 1) as part of SerDe in case this is ever stored on disk.
@dgomezferro I think you addressed that for the non window string aggregator, but not for this one here.
Please consider writing a class version number (e.g. 1) as part of SerDe in case this is ever stored on disk.
